metadata.title: CVE-2020-25266 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: AppImage appimaged before 1.0.3 does not properly check whether a downloaded file is a valid appimage. For example, it will accept a crafted mp3 file that contains an appimage, and install it.

criterions.comment: libappimage package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
